name: com.lmirman.rewiredglyphs
description: An expansion for Guavaman's Rewired Unity Asset that provides a simple to use API for showing input icons to the player at runtime based on their input method and bindings.

samples.description:
Example sprite sheets, glyph maps, and glyph collection using Kenney Pixel Prompts asset.

The icons used are public domain (CC0) from Kenney assets. For more information and licensing info refer to https://kenney.nl/assets/input-prompts-pixel-16

Example sprite sheets, glyph maps, and glyph collection using Xelu Controller Prompts asset.

The icons used are public domain (CC0) from Xelu. For more information and licensing info refer to https://thoseawesomeguys.com/prompts/
